interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bridal Hair Comb, Wekin Wedding Hair Comb Wedding Hair Accessories for Brides, Handmade Floral Hair Piece for Wedding(Gold 5.9")
Review Date: 2022/09/17
Store: JOMOQ
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'JOMOQ', 'Hair Type': 'Damaged', 'Color': 'Gold', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Power Source': 'Manual', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 4.13 x 0.94 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '756588246469'}
Review Text: This is really a beautiful hair comb. It looks quite stunning in the hair. It wasn’t incredibly well made. You might have to glue it back together. These generally aren’t worn often so how long it lasts may not be an issue. It is a beautiful addition to any hairdo.
Review Title: Beautiful…not made to last
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
I really enjoyed having something this pretty to put in my hair. You get two of each color, and they are very pretty. I don’t have a lot of hair so they were a bit lose on me. With the pearls on them, they really don’t wrap around too many times and look the same. My daughter put them around her bun in her hair. This accentuated the beauty of the hairpiece, and it worked really well-just an idea for these beautiful hair accessories. They are prettier than the pictures. I’ll be interested to see how long they stay together so I’ll put an update later on how well they last. Very pleased with this product so far, but they are not for people with thin hair.
Really beautifully made
QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
QTMY
['QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White']
{'Color': 'White', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Occasion': 'Wedding', 'Material': 'Pearl', 'Fabric Type': 'Velvet', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 5.51 x 1.69 inches; 4.59 Ounces'}
I love this very much. The colors and the beads are amazing ! It did lose one bead when I first got it so that wasn’t nice but I can put it back on sometime. It is very heavy so it slides a lot and is heavy on the head. I get headaches from heavy things so I just have to wear it for special things. I love it very much.
Very  beautiful.
Polish Due nails | Stretchable Real Nail Polish Strips| Gloss Solid Color, Ombre , French, Pattern, Glitter Finish 16Pcs | Incudes Nail Wipe, Nail File, Instructional Brochure (Pink Petals)
POLISHDUE
{'Brand': 'POLISHDUE', 'Item Form': 'Strip', 'Color': 'Clear,Pink', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Formaldehyde free, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.12 x 3.2 x 1.2 inches; 15.84 Ounces'}
These are very pretty but very thin. The glue on the back of them is super sticky and a mess to clean off your fingers. I don’t recommend these. I use a different brand that can last up to a week, but these peeked of within about two days. Not all the great to cut and file, either. I was not happy with them, I do not recommend. The color was beautiful though.
Very thin.
BBG Headbands for Women, DQCUTE 4 Pack Elastic Headbands for Women Girls Fashion Tie Dye Workout Hair Bands Headwraps for Yoga Running Sports1
BBG
{'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Polyester', 'Fabric Type': 'Polyester,Cotton', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Weight': '77 Grams', 'Package Dimensions': '8.31 x 6.06 x 0.55 inches; 2.72 Ounces'}
They have bands are pretty. Are very soft,have very nice length.They have very colorful fabric a very stretchy and straight all the way around. I like them all in all.
Nice headbands.
Rhinestone Crystal Pearl Flower Hair Clip- Cute Butterfly Duckbill Hair Pin- Wedding Alligator Barrette Hair Piece Hair Accessories For Woman (Butterfly)
JERTOCLE
{'Brand': 'JERTOCLE', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Golden', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Crystal', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 3.94 x 1.18 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '764915591229'}
These are cute…it will depend on your hair type as always as to whether they stay in your hair. My daughter has great success with most hair clips. If you are looking for something cute for a young girl, I definitely recommend these.
Adorable
Big Claw Hair Clips Super Strong Hold Hair Claw Clips for Women Girls Thick Hair, 4 Rows of Claws Nonslip Hair Clips for Thin Hair, French Plastic Jaw Clips Octopus Clip for All Hair Types , 6 Packs
Mevnccola
{'Brand': 'Mevnccola', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Plastic, Metal', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '2.3 x 1.2 x 2.3 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '733557234627'}
These are really cute, and they are a great size for a variety of looks. I really like hair clips…some are far too big to use for anything but all of ones hair and you must have a lot. These are a nice medium size, great colors, and really adorable.
Adorable…good size.
Tousled Updo Messy Bun Hair Piece Hair Extension with Elastic Rubber Band Scrunchies Extensions Hair Pieces and Ponytails Hair Extensions Synthetic Hair for Women (1B, Tousled Updo Bun)
MEDO
{'Brand': 'MEDO', 'Material': 'Rubber', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '5.75 x 5.67 x 1.65 inches; 1.45 Ounces', 'UPC': '779880422164'}
Not as much hair as some or as nice as some. The colors were pretty standard for the description. I love these types of extensions,these were not my favorite ones out there. However, not bad for the price!
Fairly nice
Maforsoon Messy Hair Bun Hair Scrunchies Extension 1PCS Curly Wavy Messy Synthetic Chignon for women Updo (Strawberry Blonde)
Maforsoon
{'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Maforsoon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '7.56 x 6.65 x 1.42 inches; 2.08 Ounces'}
When ordering go by the pictures, not the actual written description. I figured dark brown would be dark brown, but if you click on dark brown you get a picture of a light red. That is what you will get. These are cute, but they aren’t worth the $10. You can see the wrapping of the ponytail. I wanted to order one that was the right color, but the price is too high for the quality.
Disappointing…dark brown is reddish color.
ODINSON Messy Bun Hair Piece for Women Updo Hair Bun
ODINSON
{'Material': 'Human, Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'ODINSON', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 5.2 x 1.61 inches; 4.97 Ounces'}
My hair is very hard to match is black…but not the darkest black that is available. It is more what they call off black. I ordered the brown black, but it was a very dark black with little to no brown. It was too dark to look at all natural for me. It is a nice hairpiece…I just seem to wear different colors in different brands. I have a very small amount of gray/white mostly from a brain surgery. This pic is fairly true to color, though the piece is so dark that my hair looks brown-which it definitely isn’t. If your hair is really dark, the black/brown just might work for you.
Nice..but doesn’t match
Eyebrow Stencils & Eyebrow Pencil, 10 Styles of Eyebrow Shaper, Reusable Eyebrow Template with Dark Brown Dual-Ended Pencil & Eyebrow Razor, 3 Minutes Makeup, Suitable For All Face Shape
VIAMAZ
{'Brand': 'VIAMAZ', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Reusable', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable, Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '6.61 x 1.97 x 0.75 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
The stencils work well, and the pencil works though not easily. The small razor didn’t do much, and when putting on the safety cover, it broke. I wasn’t impressed at all with the razor. I used wax strips with the kit, and I’m happy with the results. I wish I had done a before and after picture. I have always had bushy eyebrows. I’ve never got the results I want from professionals. I took a bit too much off, but it is probably the best results I’ve had. So if you want to use stencils to try to get a good shape, this kit will work. You will want a better razor, though. I gave up on using it. Then it broke so easily. I am pleased with the final results.
It’s ok

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user continues to emphasize unique and aesthetically pleasing hair accessories, with an evolving focus on quality and durability. Recent purchases highlight her increased scrutiny regarding product craftsmanship and longevity while maintaining a strong aesthetic appeal.

- **User Engagement:** The user remains proactive in analyzing product descriptions and functionalities, consistently offering constructive feedback stemming from personal experiences. This trend underscores her commitment to high standards in her beauty purchases.

- **Performance Consideration:** She prioritizes secure, comfortable, and lightweight accessories for thin hair, and recent feedback indicates that her reliability expectations have intensified, especially regarding how well products hold up over time.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** Her search for versatile beauty items continues, balancing practicality for both herself and her daughter, while appreciating that aesthetic appeal must be matched with functionality.

- **Color and Quality Representation:** Vibrant colors are still appreciated; however, the user emphasizes the need for accurate color representation and lasting performance, particularly in specialized accessories.

- **Family Orientation:** Her preference for multifunctional beauty solutions reflects a focus on practicality, catering to both her own and her daughter's beauty needs.

Overall, the user’s journey showcases an ongoing evolution in her passion for beauty, marked by a discerning approach to quality, performance, and longevity, ensuring that her purchases align with her heightened expectations.
